name: ZentraChatbot
description: AI-powered chatbot for websites and document analysis

JWT_SECRET.description: A secret key for JWT token generation

CORS_ORIGIN.description: The URL of your frontend (GitHub Pages)

NODE_BACKEND_URL.description: The URL of the Node.js backend

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for using GPT models (optional)

HUGGINGFACEHUB_API_TOKEN.description: Hugging Face API token for LLM access (optional)

MINIMAL_RESOURCES.description: Set to 'true' to use a smaller model with minimal resource requirements (for free tier)

FALLBACK_MODEL_NAME.description: Custom fallback model name for Hugging Face Transformers (optional)
